properties.areaDesc: Pickens, AL; Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 9:14PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...Gainesville Lock and Dam...and Demopolis Lock and Dam...

.Additional heavy rainfall expected through Tuesday will cause
additional rises along the Tombigbee River with levels expected
to rise very close to or above moderate flood stage. With more
rainfall expected through the end of the week, these forecasts will
likely be adjusted upward. Interests should closely monitor the
latest forecasts regarding this river flood situation.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 8 PM Sunday the stage was 121.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 122 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tomorrow evening and continue
to rise to near 132.8 feet by early Thursday morning.
* Impact...At 135 feet...Widespread flooding of farm and
pasturelands...as well as cabins and camps near the river...will
occur. Flooding of some homes in the Rivermont Subdivision of
Pickensville will occur.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Monday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
